name: Ocean spray
description:
Ocean spray is a game of epic proportions. Taking place in the apocalyptic world of 2073. You and your team of survivors have located a juice factory after powering through your thirst and hunger, clutching onto life. However, the endeavor to get the juice will be difficult. That is why you alone will enter the factory, claim the juice, and leave with your life.

This game was made in 4 days, with UPBGE, (was meant) * for Alternate Engine 5, and is basically a joke.

*I tried to make it for that jam, but I don't know that a game code repository is, so I just decided to release it anyways.
